changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text

index.md.Le plugin permet de récuperer diverses d: The plugin makes it possible to recover various data from a Jeedom SAS service (the data service)
index.md.Il permet aussi de partager certaine don: It also allows to share certain anonymized data with users
index.md.Le service est 100% gratuit en phase bet: The service is 100% free in beta phase then once in stable phase it will have a quota system which will be increased in exchange for a subscription or data sharing
index.md.Chaque données partagées permet d'augmen: Each shared data increases your quota by 5%
index.md.permet de recuperer les prix des carbura: recover fuel prices from the nearest petrol station
index.md.permet de recuperer l'état de l'EJP en f: allows you to recover the state of the EJP according to your area
index.md.permet de savoir si on est un jour férié: lets know if it is a holiday
index.md.permet de connaitre votre adresse ip: allows to know your ip address
index.md.permet de connaitre la météo pour le J,J: lets you know the weather for D, D + 1, D + 2, D + 3 or D + 4 (contains the weather, temperatures, UV, wind, humidity, pressure, amount of cloud. ..)
index.md.permet de connaitre la pollution d'un po: allows to know the pollution of a geographical point in France
index.md.permet de connaitre la position du solei: lets you know the position of the sun (time of sunset / sunrise / moon, exact position of the sun and the moon ...)
index.md.permet d'avoir un TTS de qualité (se bas: allows to have a quality TTS (is based on google TTS)
index.md.permet de savoir si le jour est un jour: lets you know if the day is a school vacation day and if so which one
index.md.permet de connaitre le niveau de vigilan: allows to know the level of vigilance of a region
index.md.permet de recuperer des données d'utilis: allows you to recover data from users approximately (from 1km to 100km), to either complete your installation with more reliable data if you do not have the equipment (temperature, humidity ...) or to compare its data with other users
index.md.Les données sont moyennées sur la period: Data are averaged over the period and the chosen perimeter
index.md.Ce service étant communautaire il faut q: This service being community it is necessary that the users share their data (this one anonymized and put on a separate database) so that you can recover them
index.md.Ne pas oublier plus vous partagez plus v: Do not forget the more you share the more your quota increases (5% more quota for each shared data)
